mapper.select: SELECT /* SpecialPriceSoldOut.getSpecialPriceSoldOut, 특가 상품 여부 조회 , 김형식/SK플래닛, 2014-12-04 */ COUNT(1) FROM TB_DP_SPRC_PROD WHERE 1=1 AND EXPO_YN='Y' AND CPN_ID IS NOT NULL AND PROD_ID =#{productId} AND SYSDATE BETWEEN SPRC_APPLY_START_DT AND SPRC_APPLY_END_DT
mapper.update: /* SpecialPriceSoldOut.updateSpecialPriceSoldOut,특가 상품 SOLD OUT 필드 업데이트 , 김형식/SK플래닛, 2014-12-04 */ UPDATE TB_DP_SPRC_PROD SET SOLD_OUT_YN='Y' WHERE 1=1 AND EXPO_YN='Y' AND CPN_ID IS NOT NULL AND PROD_ID =#{productId} AND SYSDATE BETWEEN SPRC_APPLY_START_DT AND SPRC_APPLY_END_DT
